title: Aryna Sabalenka's Tough Tennis Win
summary: Aryna Sabalenka is a top tennis player who won the Australian Open in 2023 and 2024. In a recent match at the Australian Open, she played against Anastasia Potapova. Sabalenka was winning easily at first, but then Potapova fought back hard. Sabalenka felt very emotional and disconnected during the game. She had to save four set points to win the match in two tie-breaks. After the match, Sabalenka said she has learned to stay strong mentally, even when things are tough. She used to lose matches like this earlier in her career, but now she fights through her feelings. Sabalenka has won four major tournaments in the last three years and is one of the best players in women's tennis.
